alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gulf and south central Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, Liberty, southwestern Leon and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/... At 547 PM EDT/447 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Blountstown to Stonemill Creek. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Telogia, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Brown House, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Lewis, Sumatra and Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
